content: Had a great 10 mile medium run tonight. The temperature was finally on the positive side of Fahrenheit!
Rule of thumb� came from beer brewers, who would stick their thumbs into the mix to find out if the temperature was right for adding yeast
somebody in LA just complained to me about it being cold. I asked what the temperature was. He said 65. Oh ok -__-
if the temperature was warmer then It would be summer
@SportsCenter I didn't realize the temperature was an indication of the brightness of the sun.
@TheIreneAdlere - alive and kicking. Although that could change. The temperature was dropping as the night went on, she would freeze if -
last night we went to this party like half an hour away and we had to WALK all the way and the temperature was like -16
Hope everybody's ready for a stream of tweets about what the temperature was at puck drop....
Yesterday the temperature was -9 but it said it felt like -18. THOSE ARE FACTS. It was hella cold and still is
"I never actually knew what the temperature was in Italy because it was in Celsius" - @ChefBoyarDEDE1
@PsychicGigolo ohh so the temperature was almost same in karachi and Pindi today:s
Lol remember when there was snow on the ground and the temperature was below zero when I was training for Footlocker
Rule of thumb� came from beer brewers, who would stick their thumbs into the mix to find out if the temperature was right for adding yeast
2015 is off to a good start! This lovely egg was waiting for me in the next box this morning. The temperature was... http://fb.me/3ho9jNEo9
The temperature was only 2 degrees. Running in the snow would be suicidal... Visibility was bad, After finished run, like frozen dead (-_-)
Started 2015 with a 8.5km run. I was drenched with sweat as the temperature  was a hot 30°C and 61% humidity.
If I wanted to know what the temperature  was I would ask Siri, so stop snap chatting it
“@Juliana_x33: after 10 hours of just standing in Times Square while the temperature was 28 degrees, I finally got to see the ball drop”rt
after 10 hours of just standing in Times Square while the temperature was 28 degrees, I finally got to see the ball drop
felt like the temperature was below 0
I ain't know the temperature was gone drop  like this damn
fuck man the temperature was indescribable it was so amazing i wanted to cry i felt so fresh
Yesterday on my first flight to Algiers. The temperature was not as I had expected. #Jetairfly pic.twitter.com/ttM7eDuBg2
@garlicalxm a few days ago it felt like early spring because the temperature was 14celsius and its really warm for our winter
@AliciaRomanNBC @TammieSouza said the coldest Christmas was 1983 too, but the temperature was 17°, not-5°
Zuma must do something about the heat shem. Today the temperature was 41◦C. Like O___o
Has there ever been a Christmas Day at @stfxuniversity when the temperature was 16 degrees?  Enjoy!
@JasusNevas would experience another Ice Age as the temperature was declining. I'm not exactly sure, but I think it was scenarios like that.
@jordanxbrookes i live in California. Where i'm at, we don't got shit except for fog, and a rare case where the temperature was below 80
@jjboo56 the temperature was above 32 degrees fahrenheit, so the rain was not cold enough to change from a liquid rain to snow #Science
Merry Christmas!!!!!! Although I'm pretty sure the temperature was colder on Easter..
"@YOW_Weather: At 3AM, the temperature was 7.3°C. Warmest Christmas since 1982, but no record breaker. #OttNews pic.twitter.com/D7lOY5iONq"
At 3AM, the temperature was 7.3°C. Warmest Christmas since 1982, but no record breaker. #OttNews pic.twitter.com/wVmwph3fIV

1. Guests arrived between 10 pm and 10:30 pm.
2. Everyone was happy the temperature was not over 80
Maybe it would feel more like Christmas if the temperature was at least 20 degrees lower than it is now.
Even though it was rainy and foggy, the temperature was quite mild on the eve of Christm... http://ift.tt/1HFbnjS  pic.twitter.com/svbirnIIl0
The temperature was nice the rain was just drawn
The temperature was 85 degrees and the air was humid, but… http://goo.gl/HMqSIV  #GovtShutdown
As of 9pm tonight, the temperature is 60f. This same time July 16, 17, 18, the temperature was 58f. Yes, this weirds me out a little.
Imagine how much snow we'd be getting if the temperature was colder
